name: T Tec Maze
overview: A licenseware maze game created by Trevor Taylor and released in 1991. The piece of software has been designed with a competition in mind. To reach the exit you must alter the maze by moving over switches which are circles of 1,2,4 or 6 colors. Each time you land on a switch, all the gates of the same color will move. In later levels some of the gates will take on false colors to make things more interesting.
